name: Hunter Killer
overview: The date is January 1942, you are the commander of a submarine from the USA during World War II. The Japanese have just devastated Pearl Harbor. Your mission is to seek and destroy the enemy. You have torpedoes, and a deck gun and with the help of a sonar device you detect and track the enemy. Are you going to let them win or are you going to be war hero? Navigate your boat, watching your speed and course. You can dive, surface, ask for sonar reports, us a periscope, torpedoes and guns.
